00291 template <class T>
00292 void clamp(T& x,T min,T max){
00293     if( x > max )
00294     { x = max;}
00295     else if( x < min )
00296     {x = min;}
00297 }

00305 template <class T>
00306 T nextPowerof2(T v){
00307     int tmpv = static_cast<int>(v);
00308     tmpv--;
00309     tmpv |= tmpv >> 1;
00310     tmpv |= tmpv >> 2;
00311     tmpv |= tmpv >> 4;
00312     tmpv |= tmpv >> 8;
00313     tmpv |= tmpv >> 16;
00314     tmpv++;
00315     return tmpv;
00316 }
